title: Fedwiki Tools
synopsis: Here we list a few tools that are of particular use in managing and creating [[Fedwiki]] content.

title: Graphing the Federation
synopsis: Mission: to create a set of navigable maps to make it much clearer how all the sites fit together and who is working on what.

title: Mapping the Federation
synopsis: Welcome to this site where we gather technical and design issues about [[Mapping the Federation]]. Well for now we gather anything to do with [[Maps]], [[Graphs]] and [[Data Visualisation]].

title: Network Visualisation
synopsis: He we list a few pages and sites about graph and network visualisation as it relates to [[FedWiki]].

title: Ships Mapped
synopsis: The Ship Map. Global shipping via 250 milion data points. Winner at the 2016 Information is Beautiful Awards. [https://www.shipmap.org/ site]

title: Visualising the Federation
synopsis: Here we look at how we might visualise the [[Federation]], and explore using [[Cytoscape]] to achieve a scaleable ability to visualise the network of links and in particular [[Network of Forks]] relevant to a particular writing context.

title: Visualizing Page History
synopsis: As can be seen by [[Understanding Page History]] this can be complex, containing differing view points - and maybe realities.

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to this site where we gather technical and design issues about [[Mapping the Federation]]. Well for now we gather anything to do with [[Maps]], [[Graphs]] and [[Data Visualisation]].
